short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto skip ads, otherwise mute and blur and play a game while you're waiting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AdBreak enhances your YouTube™️ experience by giving you more control over the content you consume. 

What can AdBreak do? 
	• Mute and blur ads
	• Replace ads with games
	• Auto-skip skippable ads
	• Keep track of your ad-breaks (whether you gamed through them or enjoyed the peace of muted & blurred ads)
	• Easily toggle the extension off when you want to allow ads to play

What does AdBreak not do? 
AdBreak does not block ads. We let you support your favourite content creators while exercising greater control over media you consume.
